name: Time and Again
description:
You are able to make a certain amount of moves, after you finish they will be repeated. Get to the golden square.

The game currently has 10 playable levels.

Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys - move
R - Restart Level
M - Mute Music
N - Mute Sound Effects
ESC - Quit

Credits

The game was created in its entirety by Andrew Stevenson

Music

Floating Cities by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3765-floating-cities
